backend/main.mo: Defines data types and maps for salons, bookings, user profiles, images, and seeds default Swiss salon data with authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking frontend file changes to feature IDs, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides humanâ€‘written summaries of key frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions with light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper that renders the AppV1 component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React component implementing the Nexus Omniverse UI with state management, mock data, navigation, and pro/client flows.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder for the AuthHeader component.

frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder for the SalonListSection component.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and auth client management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for the useQueries hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder for the useSalonImage hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, custom utilities, and animation keyframes/classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Placeholder page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty page component file awaiting implementation.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty page module reserved for the pro dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty page file for salon details view.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing aura text for salons using category, type, tags, and city rules.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility module for future currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended OKLCH-based color tokens, custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes full project reset strategy, architecture notes, feature roadmap, and known issues.
